entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The goblin is a character in the story who breaks the silence. He is described as having slanting black eyes and a thin black beard.

entities.name: elf
entities.description: The elf is mentioned by the goblin as being buried. No further description of the elf is provided.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a wizard who has rescued a goblin and dug a grave for Dobby. He is described as an unusual wizard by Griphook.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who is being helped by Harry Potter. He has black eyes and a thin black beard.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as having been buried in a grave dug by Harry Potter.

relationships.description: Griphook was rescued by Harry Potter.
Griphook is related to Dobby, as he was rescued by Harry Potter.
Harry Potter buried Dobby in a grave.
